name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Boil water and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, heat olive oil and saut√© chopped onions and garlic.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.
Pour tomato sauce, salt, and pepper into the pan and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve the Bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate with soy sauce and sesame oil.
In a wok or large pan, heat vegetable oil and add minced garlic and grated ginger.
Add the marinated chicken and stir-fry until cooked.
Toss in chopped vegetables and cook for a few minutes.
In a small bowl, mix cornstarch with water to make a slurry and pour it into the wok to thicken the sauce.
Serve the chicken stir-fry over steamed rice.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese into thick rounds.
Arrange alternating slices of tomatoes and mozzarella on a plate.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle balsamic vinegar and extra-virgin olive oil over the salad.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the Caprese salad immediately.

name: Chocolate Brownies
steps: Preheat the oven and grease a baking pan.
In a microwave or double boiler, melt the butter and stir in sugar.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until well combined.
Sift in flour, cocoa powder, and salt; mix until smooth.
Fold in chocolate chips and chopped nuts (if using).
Pour the batter into the greased baking pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted comes out with moist crumbs.
Let the brownies cool before cutting into squares.
